resources.string: Bhopal Coders Community, is the backbone of the Tech Communities in Bhopal, such as Google Developers Group, Bhopal and Developer Circles from Facebook. Our efforts are aligned towards making Bhopal, a Technology Hub. We are looking for individuals enthusiastic about the Impact, Technology can bring.
Introducing our "Volunteer in Progress" (VIP) program. Sign up with your details, if you are interested about influencing people and making more and more individuals excited about technology
